column4: well where is the part about the "Uncommenting" thing? @ grub docum.?

one is enough :) # is the same as ## or even # #
k thx @ you 2 but is there a way to uncomment from a 2 b?
over lines not only one line
yes, but why do you want to do that?
kernel  /boot/vmlinuz-2.6.17-10-generic root=/dev/hdb2 ro quiet splash locale=de_DE
heh, thats like 5-6 lines to uncomment, do it manually .. :>
no you didnt, you flooded the room
